selectionPrompt: Select only peer‑reviewed or official preprints with strong methodology, named datasets, and effect sizes. Prefer replication, null results with implications, and policy‑relevant findings. Skip press‑release hype and mouse‑only studies unless groundbreaking.
essencePrompt: 3 bullets (plain language): 1) What was found (population/setting), 2) How we know (method, sample size, effect size/CI), 3) Why it matters + key limitation. 60–120 words total.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑sentence views: 1) Methods check (bias/confounders), 2) Practical implication or next experiment, 3) Scope limit (what this doesn’t show).
